title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 58.3 - Approval of course work or training
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 58.3 - Approval of course work or training

State Regulations

Course work or training included as part of a program
leading to licensure in a profession regulated by title VIII of the Education

Law shall be approved by the department pursuant to Part 52 of this Title. Unless otherwise exempted, all other course work or training shall be approved
by the commissioner pursuant to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
58.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
